name: Wreck Digger Demo
description:
Hello. Here I have posted my first attempt to start solo development of a metroidvania game within Game Maker Studio 2.  Game works, has 2 levels with bosses in each.

As story goes, main hero was fighter of the revolution loosing side, barely survived last of his battle and was placed into metal body to stay alive. With ongoing battles between new empire and last holding planet Alura, main hero became scavenger of fallen spacecraft looking for his long lost father taken away by the new empire which goal is to take Alura's protected earth crystal for machine to go beyond space black zone.

You can spend 20-30 minutes on the demo, bosses are nice.

left, right arrow keys - walk

down arrow key - shield

up arrow - key jump

z - shoot(projectiles out of robotic hero's body chest)

x - jetpack glide

c - melee weapon and spinattack while jumping

ENTER inventory

A inv left

S inv right

D Use selected item

Within menu press alt_ENTER for fullscreen
